answers.answer: I would see a doctor to make sure the blisters are healing  ok

question: I have type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure, and i am obese.  Both of my legs are swollen and they haveblisters.  When they pop i wash them apply neosporin and a band-aid.  They are healing ok.  Is this thecorrect way to treat these blisters?  I am having problems controlling my glucose level.
title: blisters on legs
